entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of rain mixed with light snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the evening then changing to periods of snow near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight then northwest 40 gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 10 April 2023
